keywords.hello: Hello, {name}! To process further, you may type 'help' to know more about the keywords.
keywords.coffee: The campus coffee bar is open from 8 AM to 6 PM. Grab a cup, {name}!
keywords.library: The library is open 24/7 for all students. A perfect place to focus, {name}!
keywords.courses: We offer a variety of courses, {name}. Check our website for the full list!
keywords.sports: The sports center is open from 6 AM to 10 PM. Time to break a sweat, {name}!
keywords.fees: The fees are hella expensive, {name}. Save up!
keywords.schedule: The campus schedule is available online. Let me know if you need specific timings, {name}.
keywords.events: There are lots of exciting events this semester, {name}! Stay tuned for updates.
keywords.food: The cafeteria serves delicious meals from 7 AM to 9 PM. Hungry yet, {name}?
keywords.fun: Fun is just around the corner! Did you check the game room yet, {name}?
keywords.wifi: WiFi issues, {name}? Try reconnecting or head to the IT support team.
keywords.friends: Spending time with friends is priceless, {name}. Treasure every moment!

jokes: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!
How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? None. That’s a hardware problem.
Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts!
What did the ocean say to the beach? Nothing, it just waved.
Why was the equal sign so humble? Because it knew it wasn’t less than or greater than anyone else!
Why was six afraid of seven? Because seven eight nine.
Why don’t elephants use computers? They’re afraid of the mouse!
What do you call a bear with no teeth? A gummy bear!
How does a computer get drunk? It takes screenshots!
Why did the developer break up with their partner? They had too many conflicts!
Why was the JavaScript developer sad? Because they didn’t know how to 'null' their feelings.
Why do cows have hooves instead of feet? Because they lactose!
What’s a ghost’s favorite food? Boo-berries!
Why don’t oysters donate to charity? Because they’re shellfish!
Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
random_responses: That's interesting! Can you tell me more, {name}?
I'm not sure about that, {name}. Could you clarify?
Hmm, let me think about it, {name}.
Oh, I hadn’t thought of it that way, {name}.
Hmm, let me check on that for you, {name}.
That's beyond my expertise, but I can learn more, {name}!
That's a new one for me, {name}. Let me process that.
I'm here for you, {name}. Keep sharing!
